name: Low Res Wrassle
description:
A tiny low resolution game about throwing your opponents into the lava! A game that is reminiscent of Poy Poy and Bomb Squad.

Note

Wont work on Safari! :( Play on your own risk! Also I haven't tested it with more than 2 players.

I made this game within the boundaries from LowRezJam, but not specifically for the jam.

Made with Pico8 color scheme and Godot Engine.

Controls PlayerMoveGrabThrow1WASDXC2Keyboard arrows, (comma). (dot)3IJKLBN42456(numpad)0 (numpad). (dot on numpad)
